effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 16,879 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

name: Keeza's 'B.' B.B.B.F.G
description: Every girl needs a *backup* Blazing Ballistic Blunt Force Gun.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Black Bow of the Betrayer

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Huojin Pandaren.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
